title: Mr. Mercenary: A Dark Cheating Romance
description: THIS IS A VILLAIN GETS THE GIRL ROMANCEWhen newlywed Starling Lennox finds out her husband Nicky has been cheating on her, she determines to annul the wedding and forget her foolish infatuation with him. After confronting Nicky with the evidence of his infidelity, she expects him to let her go. But she's very much mistaken. . .This is a spicy novella length unrepentant cheater romance, with on-page cheating and dark content, including toxic obsession. Please check the Author's Note at the back of the book.
author: Gable Jones
